titleStmt.title: A discovery to the prayse of God, and joy of all true hearted Protestants, of a late intended plot by the papists to subdue the Protestants. Being a true copie of a discourse between William O Conner a priest, and Anne Hussey an Irish gentlewoman: as it was brought and confirmed by oath in the Parliament House.
titleStmt.author: Hussey, Anne.
O'Conner, William.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
